_description: Room scene background template. Used by generate-scenes-gemini.js.
header: LUXURY FASHION BRAND ENVIRONMENT — IMMERSIVE SCENE BACKGROUND

black-rose.name: The Garden
black-rose.concept: Gothic cathedral garden at twilight — where darkness blooms
elements: Gothic stone arches and cathedral architecture
Wrought-iron gates with rose vine motifs
Dark blooming roses in deep shadow and moonlight
Atmospheric ground fog rolling between stone pillars
Stained glass windows casting rose-gold light fragments
black-rose.lighting: Moonlight as primary source — silver-blue cool cast with warm rose-gold accent from candles/stained glass
black-rose.palette: Deep charcoal, obsidian black, moonlit silver, rose gold warmth

love-hurts.name: The Ballroom
love-hurts.concept: Baroque theater and grand ballroom — dramatic passion in red and gold
elements: Ornate baroque theater with gilded moldings
Deep crimson velvet curtains and draping fabric
Grand marble columns with baroque detail
Dark hardwood stage floor reflecting candlelight
love-hurts.lighting: Candlelight warmth, crimson theatrical spotlights, gold accent on gilded surfaces
love-hurts.palette: Blood crimson, deep black, antique gold, candlelight amber

signature.name: The Runway
signature.concept: Minimalist luxury — marble penthouses, modern art galleries, SF skyline
elements: Pristine white marble floors with subtle veining
Floor-to-ceiling windows with San Francisco skyline
Bay Bridge illuminated at golden hour
Champagne gold accent fixtures and sculpture
Modern luxury furniture pieces as negative space
signature.lighting: Golden hour sunlight through floor-to-ceiling windows, gallery track spotlights
signature.palette: Pure white, champagne gold, cool grey marble, warm afternoon sun
signature.mood: Elevated, prestige, Bay Area luxury editorial

technical.depth: Strong depth of field — foreground, midground, background layers
technical.empty: Scene must be EMPTY — no people, no products in frame. Pure environment.
technical.resolution: Ultra-high detail for hero background use

criticalRules: NO people or characters in the scene
Environment must feel real enough to place fashion content in front of
Lighting must complement the collection's color palette
Atmosphere must match the collection's emotional identity
